2-4 weeks

Resource requirements

2-3 weeks

Policy framework

Step 3

Deployment of controls and processes

Key Deliverables:

Documentation

Step 4
Testing & Validation
2-4 weeks

Test results
Control validation

Step 5

Step 6
Continuous Monitoring
Ongoing
Ongoing compliance monitoring and improvement

Regulatory Framework Overview

Understanding the key compliance requirements across different standards

ISO 27001:2022
International Standard
Information Security Management
Comprehensive framework for establishing, implementing, maintaining and continually improving an information security management system.
NIS2 Directive
EU Regulation
Network & Information Systems
Enhanced cybersecurity requirements for essential and important entities across the European Union.
GDPR
EU Regulation
Data Protection & Privacy
Comprehensive data protection law regulating the processing of personal data of EU residents.
PCI DSS
Industry Standard
Payment Card Security
Security standard for organizations that handle cardholder information for major payment card brands.
SOC 2
Audit Framework
Service Organization Controls
Audit framework for service providers storing customer data in the cloud.
HIPAA
US Federal Law
Healthcare Information
Privacy and security requirements for protected health information in the United States.

Benefits of Compliance

Why investing in compliance delivers value beyond regulatory requirements

Enhanced Security
Robust security controls protect against cyber threats
Customer Trust
Demonstrated commitment to security builds customer confidence
Competitive Advantage
Compliance certifications differentiate in the marketplace
Risk Reduction
Systematic risk management reduces business exposure
